entry.string: Your PHP configuration does not seem to include the required LDAP extension. Please refer to http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.ldap.php on how to install it.
entry.translation: Din PHP-konfiguration verkar inte inkludera den nödvändiga LDAP-tillägget. Besök http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.ldap.php för installationsanvisningar.

entry.string: LDAP Error: Connection to server #(1) port_number #(2) failed
entry.translation: LDAP-fel: Anslutning till server #(1) portnummer #(2) misslyckades

entry.string: LDAP Error: Failed to set LDAP Protocol version to 3
entry.translation: LDAP-fel: Misslyckades att ställa in LDAP protokoll version till 3

entry.string: LDAP Error: Failed to start TLS
LDAP Error: Search LDAP base_dn #(1) filter #(2) failed
entry.translation: LDAP-fel: Sökning i LDAP bas_dn #(1) filter #(2) misslyckades
